title: Monster Soccer
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 292 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 410L, Fiction Series
description: After the Monsters start playing soccer, Bonk brags that he is so good he doesn't even need a team. So Uzzle, Lurk, and Snag go home and practice on their own. On the day of the big game, Bonk gets into trouble quickly. But luckily, his friends jump in and help him, showing Bonk why it is important to work as a team.
reviewWords: catch, dribble, kick, pass, score, soccer
awareness: Segment Phonemes : Orally segment phonemes in words with s-family blends
phonics: Consonant Blends : Associate the blends sc, sn, and st with the phonetic elements /sc/, /sn/, and /st/
wordWork: Alphabetizing                : Arrange words in alphabetical order
